title.narrative: Cultural Transformation for Social Integration and Reconciliation in Sri Lanka

description.narrative: The overall objective of the action is to promote a culture of reconciliation, social integration, diversity and inclusive citizenship in Sri Lanka.

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)
European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)

organisation.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Sri Lanka

department.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Sri Lanka

description.narrative: Ampara, Badulla, Colombo, Galle, Jaffna, Kilinochchi, Mullaitivu and Puttalam, Districts of Sri Lanka.

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
